Pricing & Plans
---------------

#### What happens if we go over the number of jobs included in our plan?

It's OK! You’ll still be able to create new jobs and work as normal for another 7 days. If your monthly plan resets in that time, your job credits will reset, otherwise you’ll be prompted to upgrade your plan.

![Image 622](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Can I really use ServiceM8 for free?

Yes! The Free Plan is completely free for solo operators. This plan provides the necessary tools to efficiently manage up to 30 jobs a month. You can create jobs, send quotes and invoices, as well as manage your clients and schedule with ease. Additionally, you can [earn unlimited bonus jobs](https://support.servicem8.com/hc/en-us/articles/9003864784015-How-to-earn-Bonus-Jobs-on-the-Free-plan) by simply accepting card payments. [Learn more about the ServiceM8 Free plan.](https://www.servicem8.com/us/free-plan)

![Image 623](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Which features come with each plan?

Every ServiceM8 plan includes all the essentials, including job cards, scheduling, quotes, invoices, email & SMS, mobile payments, and accounting integrations. However, there are some really powerful features which are only available on certain plans, such as electronic Forms. Check out the plan comparison table. We’ve built and priced our plans to be incredible value for the benefits ServiceM8 brings. If there’s an add-on in a higher plan that you’d like (but you don't need more job credits), upgrading to benefit from that feature alone will still deliver great value for money for your business.

![Image 624](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### What access do I get in trial mode?

You’ll get full access to all features during your free trial, so you can properly try ServiceM8 in your business to learn if we’re the right fit.

![Image 625](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Can I pay for setup and training services?

Yes. We have ServiceM8 Partners across the US who can help you from initial consultation through to setup and training. They'll save you time, streamline the process and add a lot of value. [Find a local ServiceM8 Partner.](https://www.servicem8.com/uk/partner-directory)

![Image 626](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Which plan should I choose if I want to fill reports & certificates on site e.g. JSA, SWMS & certificates of compliance?

To fill in electronic forms, reports & certificates on site with the ServiceM8 app, you’ll want to activate the Forms add-on. Customers on all plans (even the Free plan!) can buy & use any Form on the Form Store, where you can choose from over 250 pre-made Forms for a variety of industries and business requirements. If you want to build your own Forms, or engage a ServiceM8 Partner to create custom Forms for you, you’ll want the Growing plan (or higher).

‍

![Image 627](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### What happens if we go over the SMS’s included in our plan?

There is a standard SMS 'overage' fee per SMS sent over your plan's monthly SMS cap. View the Plan Comparison table for more info.

![Image 628](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Do I need to enter credit card details to trial?

No. You can create an account and trial ServiceM8 for 14 days, free. You only need to provide payment details if you want to go ahead and subscribe to a plan.

![Image 629](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Each plan includes a number of 'jobs'. What does this mean?

These are “job credits” — every time you create a new job card, it uses a job credit. For example, with the Growing plan, you can create 150 new jobs each month. Jobs can start out as a Quote, or a Work Order. If a Quote is accepted and you change its status to a Work Order, it won't consume another job credit.

![Image 630](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Why does each plan include SMS messages?

You can SMS (text) clients straight from their job card in ServiceM8, in the app & online. This makes it easy for everyone in your team to provide great customer service, while storing all communication with the client with the rest of their job history, in one place.

![Image 631](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Is ServiceM8’s price per user?

No — we don't charge per user! The only plan which limits the number of users you can have is the Free plan, to help sole traders get started. Once you have a team and upgrade to a paid plan, you can set up as many user logins as required.

![Image 632](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### If we go ahead, are we locked into a plan?

There are no lock-ins with ServiceM8’s pricing. You can upgrade and downgrade between plans at any time. Any credit from your previous plan will be put toward your new plan on a pro-rata basis.

![Image 633](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

Getting Started
---------------

#### Some/all of our team have Android devices, can we use ServiceM8?

Yes, you can! Download ServiceM8 Lite for Android on [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.servicem8.skip&hl=en).

While our full-featured app is optimised for iOS devices like iPhones and iPads, we've launched ServiceM8 Lite for Android. ServiceM8 Lite is designed for technicians, subcontractors, and temporary workers who need core job management features without the need for an iPhone. Your field staff can view their schedules, job details, complete checklists, and more with their Android devices.

To get the most out of ServiceM8’s advanced features and management capabilities, we still recommend using iPhones for your main field technicians.

‍Learn more about [ServiceM8 Lite for Android](https://support.servicem8.com/hc/en-us/articles/10781739471247-About-the-ServiceM8-Android-app-ServiceM8-Lite?fbclid=IwY2xjawFcmSBleHRuA2FlbQIxMAABHWwhI5EoNiA4hKSqS4D5aBFh1zKx0-2VbN4a75xPgf-QK2rat2fjUzjTUw_aem_TdsuoSdpjzDZPbtAGiwZZA). Be sure to check out our [Upgrade to iPhone offer](https://www.servicem8.com/au/android-apple-switch) for an optimised experience!

![Image 634](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Can I get a demo?

For a great overview of ServiceM8, check out our [Introduction, Demo & FAQ videos.](https://www.servicem8.com/au/introduction)

![Image 635](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### I want to get started on my own, what’s the first step?

Check out our [Getting Started Guide](https://www.servicem8.com/au/help/getting-started) for tips on basic setup & how to trial ServiceM8. This then transitions to our Learning Roadmap videos you & your team can watch to learn all the basics.

![Image 636](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### What support is available if I have questions?

We have 24/7 chat & email support — you can start a chat right here on the website, or send us an email at support@servicem8.com.

![Image 637](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### What are the options for getting started?

There are two main options to get started: 1) you can DIY with our self-serve learning resources, or 2) you can pay one of our independent ServiceM8 Partners to set up your account, create forms, train your team & more.

![Image 638](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### What are the setup options?

We have self-serve resources you can follow to DIY. Or, you can pay a ServiceM8 Partner to set up your account, customise templates, create forms & more.  
  
‍[Find a local ServiceM8 Partner.](https://www.servicem8.com/partner-directory)

![Image 639](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Do I need a credit card to sign up?

No. You'll have 14 days to try ServiceM8 free.

If we're the right fit for your business, payment is accepted by credit or debit card (online), or via In-App Purchase with your Apple ID.

![Image 640](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

Promotions & Offers
-------------------

#### Can I earn free Plan Upgrades & Add-Ons?

Yes, by progressing through the [Learning Roadmap](https://support.servicem8.com/hc/en-us/articles/360000743216-How-to-get-started-with-the-Learning-Roadmap), you can unlock higher Job & SMS limits, plan upgrades, and access to higher tier Add-Ons. Learn ServiceM8 core concepts all the way to advanced features and business process enhancements, while earning great rewards for your business.

![Image 641](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Can you help me get started with a ServiceM8 expert?

Yes! If you're thinking of engaging one of our independent ServiceM8 Partners for setup & training, we've got an awesome offer to help you save money while getting expert help. Check out the [Setup & Training Rebate.](https://www.servicem8.com/setup-rebate)

![Image 642](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Do you give a discount for new businesses just starting out?

Yes! We back small business, so if yours is less than 2 years old, check out our [New Business Offer](https://www.servicem8.com/au/new-business-special).

![Image 643](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)

#### Can you help our business invest in iPhones?

Yes. We've created the ServiceM8 Small Business Fund to help tradies & service businesses invest in quality iPhones & ServiceM8. But only while funds last!

Check out our [Upgrade to iPhone](https://www.servicem8.com/au/android-apple-switch) offer.

![Image 644](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/57d7ef8b3d16a9a554f037bf/57d7ef8c3d16a9a554f03939_drop-down-arrow.webp)
